title: Farm Machinery
description: Covers equipment, tractors, implements, and machinery systems used in modern agriculture.

title: Soil & Water Engineering
description: Focuses on irrigation, drainage, soil conservation, and water resource management for agriculture.

title: Agricultural Power
description: Includes power sources, engines, renewable systems, and energy optimization for farm operations.

title: Post-Harvest Technology
description: Covers handling, storage, processing, and preservation of agricultural products.

title: Farm Structures
description: Deals with design and construction of agricultural buildings, storage systems, and rural structures.

title: Food Processing
description: Focuses on value addition, packaging, preservation technologies, and agro-industrial systems.

title: Agricultural Environment
description: Includes environmental impact, sustainability, waste management, and climate-smart agriculture.

title: Precision Agriculture
description: Covers GIS, remote sensing, IoT systems, automation, and smart farming technologies.

title: Bioenergy
description: Focuses on biomass, biofuels, biogas, and renewable energy solutions for agriculture.

title: Climate Smart Agriculture
description: Deals with climate adaptation, mitigation, and resilient farming practices.

title: Agricultural Biotechnology
description: Includes genetic engineering, plant tissue culture, and biotechnology applications in agriculture.

title: Farm Management
description: Covers farm economics, decision-making tools, budgeting, and resource optimization.

title: Agri Automation & Robotics
description: Involves automation systems, drones, sensors, and robotics used in agriculture.

title: Livestock Systems
description: Focuses on animal housing, feeding systems, waste management, and livestock technologies.

title: Renewable Resources
description: Covers sustainable natural resource management and eco-friendly agricultural technologies.

title: Aquaculture Systems
description: Deals with fish farming technologies, water quality management, and integrated aquaculture.

title: Rural Development
description: Includes rural infrastructure, community development, and extension services.

title: Agricultural Economics
description: Covers agri-markets, supply chains, value chains, and economic analysis of farm systems.

title: Sustainable Agriculture
description: Focuses on eco-friendly practices, biodiversity, and regenerative agriculture.

title: Hydrology & Watershed Engineering
description: Covers watersheds, hydrological modeling, runoff management, and conservation.

title: Geo-informatics
description: Covers GIS, GPS, spatial mapping, and remote sensing technologies.

title: Agricultural Policy
description: Deals with agricultural laws, policies, government programs, and regulatory frameworks.

title: Crop Production Systems
description: Covers agronomic systems, crop management techniques, and optimization of production.
